form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: WORK EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATION OF HOUSEHOLD DOMESTIC SERVICE WORKERS, DE 6157 ( (12-68)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 WORK EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATION OF HOUSEHOLD DOMESTIC SERVICE WORKERS To qualify for Alien Employment Certification as a Household Domestic Service Worker, the alien must have had one full year of FULL TIME paid experience. As evidence that the person to whom the position is offered has had this experience, the employer submitting this request must present written state- ments from present or past employers which provide the following information: A. Name of employer and complete address where alien worked B. Dates (month/day/year) employment started and ended C. Hours of work per day, days of work per week D. Wages paid (by day, week, or month) E. Detailed statement of duties performed, including an indication of equipment and appliances used (if any) Each statement must a) identify the writer, b) show in what capacity he is testifying. If not a present or previous employer, the person submitting the statement must so state and explain how he had knowledge of the alien's work experience. c) show the date on which the letter or statement was signed. A statement not in the English language must be accompanied by a translation certified by the translator as to the accuracy of the translation, and as to his competency to translate. A form to supply the information required is on the reverse. This may be sent to present or former employers for completion, if desired. STATE OF CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT DE 6157 (12-68) Household Domestic Experience Requirement
